description:
Only a scant few days left before the joint live show "Big Bang Festival", so the rehearsals are intense as well!
That`s when it`s discovered that the wrong CD was sent to the Aerospace Exploration Agency!
Atom feels responsible for the group`s dream of "delivering a kiss to the end of the galaxy" and travels to rocket launch site on Tanegashima.
He manages to deliver the CD just fine, but then something else was in store for him...
As the time for the "Big Bang Festival" is getting closer and closer, all of the Pythagoras idols embark on the biggest gamble ever, following Rui`s suggestion!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Big Bang Created from a Kiss
